==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|かい|がい|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かいがい}} {{m|ltc|海外|tr=xoj<sup>X</sup> ngwaj<sup>H</sup>|lit=sea + outside, beyond}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|海外|tr=hǎiwài}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kan|かいがい|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かいがい}}

# the area [[beyond]] the [[border]]s, [[overseas]], [[foreign countries]]

====Usage notes====
As Japan is an island nation, all other countries are “beyond the sea”. This word is thus often used synonymously with {{m|ja|国際|tr=kokusai||international}}.

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|international}} {{ja-r|国際|こくさい}}
